name: modem_rebooter
description: I updated the firmware in my TL-MR3420 and a cmd ( ``` curl -H "Referer: http://192.168.0.1/userRpm/SysRebootRpm.htm" -H "Authorization:Basic YW1bpxmkYTphbWlubGRh" http://192.168.0.1/userRpm/SysRebootRpm.htm?Reboot=Reboot ``` ) stopped working. So I decided to use selenium, but because there are frames there and it doesn't to get through. I used wireshark to study what is happening and in the end it turned out...:)
author: Daniil Loban
